attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People entering Britain, do so to enhance their standard of living.

To maintain an equal balance, we should only allow people to enter Britain, based on the same number of  people leaving britain, to live in other countries worldwide.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
